title: Quin 1
description: Quin Kavanagh has it all – extraordinary looks, powerful magic, and an endless sea of beautiful witches to choose from, but the one witch he wants, he’s never met. The mysterious angel influences his every move, confounding his friends and complicating his sex life, yet he refuses to forsake his dream girl for those in his reality.  Fans of the Mystic Series will love getting a deeper look at its magical characters through this series of scenes chronicling Quin's younger years. Explore this hero with heart at ages sixteen and twenty then follow him into the most breathtaking moment of his life – the moment he finally meets the woman of his dreams.  This is book one in a three book series.
author: B.C. Burgess
